mapper.select: SELECT SPRINT.ID AS ID, SPRINT.NAME AS NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, SCRUM_MASTER_ID, PROJECT_ID FROM SPRINT JOIN PROJECT ON SPRINT.PROJECT_ID = PROJECT.ID WHERE PROJECT.ID = #{projectId}
SELECT ID, NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, SCRUM_MASTER_ID, PROJECT_ID FROM SPRINT WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM USER JOIN ROLES ON USER.ROLES_ID = ROLES.ID JOIN SPRINT_USER ON USER.ID = SPRINT_USER.USER_ID WHERE SPRINT_USER.SPRINT_ID = #{sprintId}

SELECT SPRINT.ID AS ID, NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, SCRUM_MASTER_ID, PROJECT_ID FROM SPRINT JOIN SPRINT_USER ON SPRINT.ID = SPRINT_USER.SPRINT_ID JOIN USER ON SPRINT_USER.USER_ID = USER.ID WHERE USER.ID = #{userId} AND (#{startDate} <= SPRINT.END_DATE AND #{endDate} >= SPRINT.START_DATE)

SELECT USER_STORY.ID AS ID, USER_STORY.NAME AS NAME, USER_STORY.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, USER_STORY.POINTS, USER_STORY.MARKET_VALUE, USER_STORY.PROJECT_ID as PROJECT_ID, USER_STORY.SPRINT_ID as SPRINT_ID FROM USER_STORY JOIN SPRINT ON USER_STORY.SPRINT_ID = SPRINT.ID WHERE SPRINT.ID = #{sprintId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPRINT (PROJECT_ID, NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, SCRUM_MASTER_ID) VALUES (#{project.id}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{scrumMaster.id})
mapper.select: SELECT USER.ID AS user_id, USER.FORENAME, USER.SURNAME, USER.EMAIL, ROLES.ID AS roles_id, ROLES.DEVELOPER, ROLES.SCRUM_MASTER, ROLES.PRODUCT_OWNER FROM USER JOIN roles ON roles_id = roles.id WHERE user.id = #{sprint.scrum_master_id}
SELECT ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, MANAGER_ID, PRODUCT_OWNER_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID = #{sprint.project_id}
